arts.ttl: Brentford end Palace's unbeaten run with first win at Selhurst Park
arts.sum: Brentford made it back-to-back Premier League away wins with a 2-1 victory over Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park on Sunday. Bryan Mbeumo ’s retaken penalty and a Kevin Schade header gave the Bees only a second win in 10 matches across all competitions.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Brentford: Confirmed Lineups, Team News and Score Prediction
arts.sum: Crystal Palace vs Brentford: Sunday 26th January 2025, 14:00 GMT Crystal Palace will look to maintain their impressive form when they take on Brentford at Selhurst Park. Crystal Palace vs Brentf...

arts.ttl: Brentford boss Thomas Frank reveals injury setback forced defender to miss Crystal Palace victory
arts.sum: Brentford head coach Thomas Frank reveals why one of his defenders was unavailable for Sunday's 2-1 Premier League win over Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace told to submit improved offer for 25-year-old midfielder
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are reportedly keen on signing the Trabzonspor midfielder Batista Mendy. According to a report from Gune Bakis, they have submitted a £10 million offer to sign the player, but the Turkish outfit are holding out for a fee of around £12.6 million. It will be interesting to see if Crystal Palace decide to […] The post Crystal Palace told to submit improved offer for 25-year-old midfielder appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Brentford deserved their ‘big three points’ – Frank
arts.sum: Thomas Frank felt Brentford fully deserved their win at Crystal Palace. Bryan Mbeumo’s retaken penalty and Kevin Schade’s header put the visitors in control but they came under late pressure after Romain Esse pulled a goal back. Bees boss Frank declared: “It’s a big three points…against a very good team that I like and I […] The post Brentford deserved their ‘big three points’ – Frank appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Brentford reject loan offer from Strasbourg for Fabio Carvalho
arts.sum: According to a report from Foot Mercato, Brentford have rejected a loan offer for Fabio Carvalho (22) from Strasbourg. The Portuguese attacking midfielder has several admirers among those associated with the…

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg reach full agreement to sign Danish international
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg have reportedly agreed a deal to sign Mads Roerslev on loan from Brentford.

arts.ttl: Romain Esse talks through first Crystal Palace goal and Premier League debut in Brentford loss
arts.sum: Romain Esse said he could not have had better start in a Crystal Palace shirt – but was gutted his new side were unable to secure any points in their 2-1 defeat at home to Brentford on Sunday. “It couldn’t have [got off to a better start],” said Esse to SkySports.

arts.ttl: Bryan Mbeumo’s penalty-taking ability applauded by Brentford boss Thomas Frank
arts.sum: The Cameroon international remains one of just five Premier League players never to have missed from the spot.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner says Crystal Palace were not good enough in Brentford defeat
arts.sum: “This was a game where both teams neutralised each other for most of the minutes,” said Glasner. Oliver Glasner said his Crystal Palace side’s “OK” performance was not good enough to get past Brentford as they fell to a 2-1 defeat on Sunday at Selhurst Park.
